overview:
StarGreetz is a technology platform and content company that allows brands, TV shows, movies, musicians and celebrities to engage customers/fans with one-on-one personalized video conversations.

Leveraging Facebook, email, Twitter, print/POP/outdoor advertising and more, we offer brands and marketers innovative multi-platform solutions that empower them to speak directly to their customers as unique individuals; and gives fans a powerful connection with their favorite stars. We also allow others to license our platform to optimize their messaging.

Our proprietary technology platform allows the voices and images of todayâ€™s most popular celebrities, iconic characters, celebrity spokespeople and everyday stars to be transformed into personalized rich-media messages. This content can be user-customized with names, locations, hobbies, relationships, descriptions and countless other variables to make and share millions of distinctly different messages.

We create interactive marketing campaigns for all digital platforms that engage, empower, entertain and activate consumers. Our multi-platform solutions include optimized personalized video: CRM, Facebook/Website, print/outdoor/on-pac (including QR Code and text-to-call), internet, and other added-value products.

On the premium side, StarGreetz writes, produces and distributes an original library of highly- personalized celebrity content that includes eCards, eInvitations, ringtones, voicemail, and more for retail sales. All feature stars from film, music, television, comedy, sports, literature and fashion, plus other genres that people are passionate about.
